item.title: CentOS安装常用的软件
item.description: 安装 pg 参考官网; Install the repository RPM: yum install https://download.postgresql.org/pub/repos/yum/reporpms/EL-7-x86_64/pgdg-redhat-repo-latest.noarch.rpm Install the client packages: yum install postgresql11 Optionally install the server packages: yum install postgresql11-server Optionally initialize the Database and enable automatic start: /usr/pgsql-11/bin/postgresql-11-setup initdb systemctl enable postgresql-11 systemctl stop postgresql-11 systemctl start postgresql-11 systemctl restart postgresql-11 systemctl status postgresql-11 修改配置允许外部 ip 访问数据库 修改/var/lib/pgsql/11/data/postgresql.conf #listen_addresses = 'localhost' # what IP address(es) to listen on; 改为 listen_addresses = '*' 修改/var/lib/pgsql/11/data/pg_hba.conf
